name: Caves2
description:
You are a simple miner who adventured a little too deep....

With no way to go back you must push forward. Your only equipment are the bombs you carry and your torch.

Use your bombs to explore dark caves full of evil. Find the key and escape to the next level before it is too late...

This is a work In progress so some things may not look/work as expected.

Please help me improve this game by reporting any bugs that you find.

CONTROLS

W,A,S,D to move

SPACE to plant bombs

ESC to restart

NOTE

Caves 2 is just a project title. Final name to be decided.
